titleStmt.title: To the Right Honourable, and Right Worshipfull, the Knights and Burgesses of the Lower Howse of Parliament: the humble petition of the artizan cloth-workers of London

notesStmt.note: Requesting restrictions on the exportation of white cloth, i.e. undyed and undressed--STC.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall Library, London, England.
